author: makortel
body:
This PR updates the tracking MC validation scripts. Notable updates
- New plots
  - Efficiency and fake rate vs. pileup
  - Fake rate etc. vs. seeding layer set (histograms added in just-merged #14248)
  - Produce vertex validation plots also for FastSim (now that vertex validation is included there)
  - Time per built track and per selected high-purity track for each iteration
- Add a set of "extended" plots that are not produced by default, but e.g. with `makeTrackValidationPlots.py --extended`
  - For now these include the distributions of all/true/fake/duplicate tracks vs. the same quantities as the fake/duplicate/pileup rate plots are made

Tested in 8_1_0_pre3, no changes expected in standard workflows.

@rovere @VinInn
title: Update tracking MC validation scripts
